message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, I'm willing to compromise a bit, but this is my final offer.  Let's wrap this up before inflation eats away any more of our money!
You said the money is losing value for you, I'm willing to take advantage of that. This is my best offer.
Okay, Bob, I'm tired of playing this game.  Take the larger share - but I'm not going to let you take advantage of me anymore.  This is my final offer.
